title: How to find a song you know the tune of but don't remember the words - Quora

response.answer_text: Best way I’ve found to try to make out at least a few words and search them in google. That isn’t always possible so the way I’ve had to do it before is to just listen to a bunch of songs until you find it. If it’s on the radio or in a public place most likely its going to be on a top song list of the genre. Your best bet would be to go to a music streaming service such as Spotify or Apple Music or even YouTube and find what are the top songs of the genre the song is. You can then listen to snippets of each song and go from there.

Think back to the time in your life you remember hearing it, where was you and how did you feel at the time? Where you with anyone? If you were then you could ask them if they can remember when…. Etc etc! Also, how old were you roughly and was it a song you recall hearing on numerous occasions at that time or just once or twice?? As you could then try to search through releases from around that time/year… Should it be a song you recall being played frequently then it is likely to of been popular and therefore likely to have been in the charts, which I imagine are easily accessible with a search on Google or two :) x
